Title: adMob for Windows Phone 7
Description:
This project aims to provide Windows Phone 7 developers an opportunity to monetize their free applications.

The output of the project is a User Control that can be dropped into any Silverlight page.
HomeWiki:
NOTE: I won't be developing the software going forward, since Microsoft has released Bing Ads for WP7. I understand that the Bing Ads are currently only available for US developers, so AdMob is a necessity for non-US devs. Unfortunately time constraints do not allow me to continue polishing the code. For those outside of US who still want to use Bing Ads, I suggest partnering with a US based developer.

Still it would be a shame to dump this code and I would love for someone who actually needs it to continue development on it. Drop me a line, if this is you. With that said, the software, as written, does works right now, but it does need some polish for sure.

Project Description

This project aims to provide Windows Phone 7 developers an opportunity to monetize their free applications.

The output of the project is a User Control that can be dropped into any Silverlight page.

I've cooked up a short video showing how to embed ads into your Windows Phone 7 application.
